channel.title: Anyone have a command for unlim hp?
channel.description: Hey, I was just wondering if anyone had the code for a command that gives u unlim hp withut having to edit it through characters folder.

item.title: Anyone have a command for unlim hp?
item.dc:creator: @barkingdogc barkingdogc
item.description:
@barkingdogc wrote:

put under

public boolean process() {

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("player name")){ // infinity health if(IsDead) IsDead = false; NewHP = playerLevel[3]; }
wait a sec to let me explain
ok the

if(IsDead) is saying if the player reaches 0 hp and suposed to die then

IsDead = false; player isnt dead and

NewHP = playerLevel[3]; recharge health in skill 3 meaning once this person gets to 0 hp they will go back up to base hp level and no dieing emote and they dont get teled anywhere so they keep fighting

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone have a command for unlim hp?
